dmca.title: [EV1-C1215366R] Complaint
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: Scary Dolls [mailto:theend@scary.ru] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 12:24 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: FW: [EV1-C1215366R] Complaint
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C1215366R] Complaint


Hello DMCA,
The matter is that my piece work has been stolen. My copyright is mentioned in the
titles. I am a Russian citizen so I am not subject to any code active in your
country and do not have to register my works in your national copyright agencies or
whatever. I just kindly ask you to remove my work from your or your client's
web-site. I would appreciate that.
I am a well-recognized animator in the internet. I am a participant and winner of
numerous film festivals throughout the world, includng your country. I think I am
able to prove my copyright in court.
Sincerely,
Andrei Bakhurin


Wednesday, October 4, 2006, 7:23:25 PM, you wrote:
